titles.title: Behold, He is coming with clouds

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 b1 v2 b2 b2 b3

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
To him that loved us, and washed us
From our sins in his own blood
And has made us kings and priests
To His God and Father
To Him be glory and dominion
For ever and ever. Amen.
(Amen. Amen)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Behold, he cometh with clouds
And every eye shall see him
Even they who pierced him
And all the tribes of the earth
Will mourn because of Him

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Even so, Amen
Even so, Amen
Even so, Amen

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am the Alpha and the Omega
The beginning and the end
I am the Alpha and the Omega
The beginning and the end
Says the Lord,

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
Who is and
Who was and
Who is to come
Who is and
Who was and
Who is to come
The Almighty

verse.name: b3
verse.lines:
The Almighty
The Almighty
The Almighty
Amen
